overview:
Paul DePinto is Vice President of Sales at Invoke Solutions.

With over 20 years of sales and management experience Paul has been a key member of the Invoke sales organization since 2002 in the roles of Senior Account Executive, Director of Field Sales, and presently as Vice President of Sales. Prior to Invoke, Paul was instrumental in the success of marketing solutions and Internet start up organizations such as Red Brick Systems and enCommerce. He started his career as a Staff Manager at AT&T and moved into senior sales and national account manager roles at Information Builders. Paul has worked with a broad base of marketing research clients in many industries and holds membership positions in the American Marketing Association and the Advertising Research Foundation.

Source: Invoke Solutions
